name: SysML v2 to PlantUML Diagram Transformation
description: Transform a SysML v2 model into PlantUML class diagram code that visualizes the system architecture
prompt:
Convert this SysML v2 model into PlantUML code that visualizes the system architecture.

Mapping rules:
1. Each 'part def' becomes a PlantUML class with <<part def>> stereotype
2. Each 'port def' becomes a class with <<port def>> stereotype
3. Specialization (:> or specializes) becomes inheritance arrow (<|--)
4. Part usages (parts within a part def) become composition (*--)
5. Attributes become class members with their types
6. Port usages become associations with appropriate stereotypes
7. Use clear, hierarchical layout directives for readability

The PlantUML should render a clear architecture diagram showing the system structure and relationships.

Output only valid PlantUML code starting with @startuml and ending with @enduml.
